description: Select this whether you want a basic time or a full blown chop! If you have curly, thick, or extra long hair, please call us so we can make sure your apointment is the correct length.
Our signature haircut plus a treatment of your choice- deep conditioning, clarifying, or strengthening.
We'll start with a wash, scalp massage, and conditioning treatment, then we will either blowout or dry and style your hair to your liking.
Do you truly need just a half an inch of a trim? Book our 30 minute quick cut to save yourself some time and money!
If all you need is your fringe touched up, select this service. No hair other than your bangs will be cut during this service.
One single process color applied to the entire head. No highlights or lowlights, no balayage.
Retouch your roots or any grays to blend with previously dyed mid-lengths.
